name: MrCalendar
0:
”Alexa, open Mr. Calendar”
”Alexa, open Mister Calendar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mr calendar
des:
Fun skill for young adults to test their knowledge on the months of the year. Once the skill is enabled you can 
a.) start a quiz where you will get quizzed on questions like:
 1. What number represents the month of June?
 2. How many days in April?
 3. What comes before January?
b.) Ask for facts ( outside the quiz mode )
 1. Tell me about August
 2. Tell me about the 11th month
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
